instruction.en:
# Pairing
Triple press the action button, the switch will be set to exclusion mode, and waiting to be excluded, then the switch will be excluded from the network.

# Factory Reset
Press and hold down the action button for over 10 seconds, the switch will be reset to factory defaults.

hint.en:
1. When press and hold down “Reset” button for 10S to reset the switch, send "Device Reset Locally Notification CC" to associated devices of this group to report factory reset information.
2. When load state changes, send "Basic Report CC" to associated devices of this group.
3. When over temperature is detected, send “Emergency shutoff status" to Lifeline.
